sentence.Network_en: He was highly praised, and deservedly so, by the Asian Times.
sentence.Network_cn: 他受到了《亚洲时报》的高度赞扬，而他确实当之无愧。

sentence.Network_en: He deservedly won the Player of the Year award.
sentence.Network_cn: 他理所应当地获得了年度最佳球员奖。
这餐馆为大众喜爱是理所当然的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...deserve v 应受，值得（de加强+serve→加强服务→值得[重视]）deservedly ad 当然应受地disserve v 损害，伤害（dis坏+serve→服务不好→损害）.
deserved 应得deservedly 应得报酬地deserving 应得的
理所当然的英语翻译，理... ... deserved 发音播放 deservedly 应得地，理所当然地 take for granted 想当然地以为，认为……理所应当.
rembrandt is a deservedly famous artist ., 伦勃朗是个当之无愧的名画家.

list.abs: He deservedly earned the admiration of his colleagues ., 他理所当然地得到了同事们的钦佩.
He deservedly earned the admiration of his colleagues ., 他理所当然地得到了同事们的钦佩.
rembrandt is a deservedly famous artist ., 伦勃朗是个当之无愧的名画家.
今天是国内的立春,一起吃春饼,学英... ... deserveto do sth 应受到某物 deservedly so 理所应当 get what you deserve 罪有应得.
beauty is a form of power . And deservedly so ., 美丽是一种权力 . 理应如此.

entry.tran: 应得地;值得地;理所应当地
entry.def: You use deservedly to indicate that someone deserved what happened to them, especially when it was something good.

example.ex: He deservedly won the Player of the Year award...
example.tran: 他理所应当地获得了年度最佳球员奖。

example.ex: You will have to book well in advance for this deservedly popular hotel...
example.tran: 这家备受欢迎的旅馆可谓名不虚传，你需要早早预订。

sentences.sentence: "he chalked up two goals which deservedly gave Bolton their second victory of the season"

auth_sentence.content: Nevertheless, this was a deservedly successful record.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nevertheless, this was a deservedly successful record.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nevertheless, this was a deservedly successful record.

auth_sentence.content: Now, deservedly, her breakthrough has come.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now, deservedly, her breakthrough has come.

auth_sentence.content: The first, deservedly; the second, not at all.
auth_sentence.res_content: The first, deservedly; the second, not at all.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The first, deservedly; the second, not at all.

stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve[n.储备[物],储备金;缄默 v.保留,储备;预定]+ed……的→保留的,不多说的
service[n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修]+able能……的→可服务的→有用的
serv服务+ile……的→为[主人]服务的
deserve[v.应受,值得]+dly→adv.应得报酬地,当然地
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
stems_affixes.word_buile: conserve保存,保藏+ation表名词→n.保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
conserve保存,保藏+ative物→n.保守主义者
servile[adj.奴性的,百依百顺的]+ity表名词→n.奴态,卑屈
de去掉+sert=serv服务,上菜→把正餐撤走,上餐后甜点
ob加强+serve=serv保持+ance表名词→一直在保持→遵守,奉行
observe观察,观测,注意到+ation表名词→n.观察,观测,监视;[n.]观察资料;观察力
observe观察+atory场所→用来观察的场所
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
reserve保留,储备+oir→保留水的地方
serv服务+ant人→服务[主人]的人→仆人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奴隶状态,惩役,地役权,使用权
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+itude状态→服务的状态→奴隶状态,惩役
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存
de加强+serv服务+e→加强服务→值得[重视]
dis不,坏+serv服务+e→坏的服务→危害

stems_affixes.value_cn: 观察,观测,注意到,监视,遵守,评述,说
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob加强动作+serv保持+e→一直保持→遵守,引申为观察
pre预先+serv保留+e→预先保留→保存
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修
